content: r96 and work 1 treble_crochet d side working on r95 in blo *skip 2 sts treble_crochet in next st chain 1 treble_crochet in the 1st skipped st* repeat across the side e at the end of the side repeat the treble_crochet chain 1 and the extra treble_crochet in corner chain- 3 space to lock the corner f repeat for all 4 sides g join with 1 slip_stitch in the 1st treble_crochet total 496 treble_crochet 120 per side 4 per corner 4 chain-1 or chain-2 spaces 1 per corner round 98 - 102 kelly green a work the same construction as r97 same corner + crossed-treble_crochet side repeat b start in any corner chain-1 space 2 treble_crochet chain 1 2 treble_crochet c repeat side r97 with fptr and join with 1 slip_stitch in the 1st treble_crochet d for full clarity follow the video the stitch path is identical each round total at the end of round 102 560fptr 140 per side 16 treble_crochet 4per side 4 chain- 1 or chain-2 spaces 1 per side thanks for stitching with me ¡gracias por
